item.title: Azhagai Paadavanthen: Translation
item.description: Chorus:Man: I came to sing of Beauty There are no suitable words in Tamil The kisses you spill on my chest Are the pearls in my memory

item.title: Hosh Walon Ko Khabar Kya: Lyrics and Translation
item.description: Another romantic ghazal by Jagjit Singh from Sarfarosh! http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iWEzJj4Ajgc&feature=BFa **Hoshwalon Ko Khabar Kya Bekhudi Kya Cheez Hai** What do conscious people know What it is like to lose oneself

item.title: Benaam sa yeh dard: Lyrics and Translation
item.description: A translation after a long time! Here is a song from Jagjit Singh. Benaam sa yeh dard thahar kyon nahi jaata jo beet gaya hai vo

item.title: Suhani Raat Dhal Chuki: Lyrics and Translation
item.description: This is a soothing, sweet, romantic Hindi song from the 1949. **Suhani Raat Dhal Chuki, Na Jaane Tum Kab Aaoge, Jahan Ki Rut Badal Chuki, Na Jaane Tum Kab Aaoge,**

item.title: Unna Nenachen Pattu Padichen: Lyrics and translation
item.description: Here is another Kamal song sung by SPB. This is from the movie Aboorva Sagotharargal where Kamal acts as brothers. One who looks normal and another who is very short.

item.title: Kaalamellam Kadhal Vazhga: Lyrics and Translation
item.description: One of my readers requested a translation of this. Makes me happy that she asked! **kaalamelaam kaadhal vaazhga kaadhalenum vaedham vaazhga kaadhalae nimmadhi kanavugalae adhan sannidhi

item.title: Uyire en Uyire: Lyrics and Translation
item.description: For a change, this is a more recent song. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7qMTUVkahjU **M: Uyire en uyire ennavo nadakuthadi Adada intha nodi valvil inikuthadi Oh oru nimidam oru nimidam enai nie piriyathe

item.title: Kaadhalin Deepam â€“ Lyrics and Translation
item.description: This is a melodious potential Ohrwurm which describes how he is falling in love. As it seems to be typical of the time period in which this movie was made, the choreography is weird, their expressions seem more contemplative or sad than joyful and the costume design is odd but the song sounds good.

item.title: Swasame â€“ Lyrics and Translation
item.description: From Thenali, another Kamal Movie (:)), this clip starts with her singing to him and he tells her that it would be better to sing a duet in their dreams (unobserved by street people) so they can change location and clothes as they please (as it typical of movie songs).

item.title: Oraayiram Paarvayile Lyrics and Translation
item.description: Iâ€™ve always found this song very hauntingly romantic. **Nooru murai piranthaalum nooru murai iranthaalum Unai pirinthu vegu thooram naan oru naalum povathillai Ulagaththin kanngalile uruvangal marainthaalum

item.title: Ennavale Adi Ennavale Lyrics and Translation
item.description: Back to more recent times. I remember this and another songâ€™s effects and graphics very well from when I watched the movie Kadhalan. Patta Rap, Mukkala Mukkabala and other songs from this movie also became very popular but this must be the most melodious of the collection.

item.title: Main Shaayar Toh Nahi Lyrics and Translation
item.description: This is one of the old goodies of Hindi music. It has a very simple structure but nice meanings. This time, the video is below the translation.

item.title: Sundari Kannal oru Sethi Lyrics Translation
item.description: When people fall in love in many Indian movies, the various stages of love are expressed in the form of songs. This nurtures the music industry and aids the current rules of censorship that prohibit on screen kissing on lips and other forms of displays of affection.
